cip.render.raytrace.geometry

Class AQuadricGeo

  • java.lang.Object
    • cip.render.raytrace.geometry.AGeometry
      • cip.render.raytrace.geometry.AQuadricGeo
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IDynXmlObject, INamedObject, IRtGeometry
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Cone, Cylinder, Hyperboloid, HyperParaboloid, Paraboloid, Sphere

    abstract class AQuadricGeo
extends AGeometry
    This is an abstract class for a quadric object geometry. Quadric geometries all wrap a Quadric3f object with XML load and ray-tracing capabilities. The ray-tracing capabilities are pretty much the same for all quadrics, so most of the code is here.

      • isConvex

        public boolean isConvex()
        Description copied from class: AGeometry
        The default implementation returns false, that the object is not convex.
        Specified by:
        isConvex in interface IRtGeometry
        Overrides:
        isConvex in class AGeometry
        Returns:
        Returns true if the object is convex and false if the object is not convex or the convexity cannot be verified.

      • isInside

        public boolean isInside(Point3f pt)
        Description copied from interface: IRtGeometry
        Tests whether a point is inside ot outside the geometry. This might be interesting, for example, for a travelling camera that ystal ball.
        Parameters:
        pt - (readonly) The point to be tested.
        Returns:
        true if the point is inside the geometry, false otherwise.

      • getRayIntersection

        public boolean getRayIntersection(@NotNull
                                  @NotNull RayIntersection intersection,
                                  @NotNull
                                  @NotNull Line3f ray,
                                  boolean bStartsInside,
                                  int nSample,
                                  int nRandom)
        Tests a ray for an intersection with a sphere. See IRtGeometry description of getRayIntersection().
        Specified by:
        getRayIntersection in interface IRtGeometry
        Overrides:
        getRayIntersection in class AGeometry
        Parameters:
        intersection - The intersection of the ray and the surface. The intersection will be either freshly initialized or will contain information about the closest intersection discovered thus far.
        ray - The ray being tesed for intersection.
        bStartsInside - false if this is an outside ray, true if this is a ray spawned from an intersection with this object and on the inside of the object.
        nSample - The pixel sub-sample index. This is used in distributed ray-tracing to make sure the correct sample displacement is used for samples that are distributed.
        nRandom - The jitter array index..
        Returns:
        Returns true if there is an intersection with this object that is closer than the current intersection, and false otherwise.

      • testShadow

        public boolean testShadow(RayIntersection intersection,
                          Vector3f vLight,
                          float fDistLight,
                          IRtLight light,
                          int nSample,
                          int nRandom)
        Description copied from class: AGeometry
        The default implementation returns false, that there is no cast shadow.
        Specified by:
        testShadow in interface IRtGeometry
        Overrides:
        testShadow in class AGeometry
        Parameters:
        intersection - The intersection being tested for shadow.
        vLight - The direction from the intersection to the light.
        fDistLight - The distance from the intersection to the light.
        light - The light. This is supplied as an argument in the event an object is both a light source and a geometry and the geometry of the light should not be tested for casting a shadow from that light.
        nSample - The pixel sub-sample index. This is used in distributed ray-tracing to make sure the correct sample displacement is used for samples that are distributed.
        nRandom - The jitter array index.
        Returns:
        Returns true if this object casts a shadow from the light and false otherwise.
